casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

April 1, 2011

[Cite as 04/01/2011 Case Announcements, 2011-Ohio-1580.]

RECONSIDERATION OF PRIOR DECISIONS

2009-2307. Fed. Ins. Co. v. Executive Coach Luxury Travel, Inc.

Allen App. Nos. 1-09-17 and 1-09-18, 2009-Ohio-5910. Reported at 128 Ohio St.3d 331, 2010-Ohio-6300,_N.E.2d__On motions for reconsideration. Motions denied. Request for oral argument denied.

Lundberg Stratton and O’Donnell, JJ., dissent. McGee Brown, J., not participating. Timothy P. Cannon, J., of the Eleventh Appellate District, sitting for Cupp, J.
